properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jeevitha yaathra yentho katihnamu (2) Ghorandhakaara thuphaanu lunnavi (2) Abhyantharamulu yennenno undu (2) Kaayu vaarevaru rakshinchedevaru (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hrudayamu shuddi parachu konnaanu Naa chethu lentho parishudda paracha Anukonani reeti niraasha vachchi Naa jeevitamunu naashana parache{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neeve aashrayam kristesu prabhuvaa Anudinamu nannu aadarinchedavu Neetho unnaanu viduva ledanedu Nee prema madhura swaramu vinnaanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ee anubhavamutho ne nadachu kondu Priya Yesu vaipu nenu choochuchu Gatamu nantha nenu marachi poyedanu Kanneeru thuduchu naa priya prabhuvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thodai yundedavu anthamu varaku Neevu viduvavu andaru vidachinanu Nootana balamu naa kosagedavu Ne stiramuga nunda nee korika idiye{/lang-eng}
